manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We harness the power of pure essential oils and herbs to create a healthy oral environment. Use our Naturally Strong, dentist-recommended rinse daily for refreshingly healthy teeth and gums. Reduce harmful bacteria Control bleeding and inflamed gums Eliminate bad breath Relieve dry mouth and mouth sores Use daily for naturally healthy teeth and gums Revitalize oral care routine

Powerful herbs and essential oils in Tooth & Gums Tonic were chosen for their healing properties. Cinnamon Bark - an essential oil that reduces bacteria, inflammation, and irritation.Eucalyptus - an essential oil that helps boost circulation and speeds the healing process.Lavender - a soothing essential oil that helps heal damaged tissue.Peppermint - an essential oil that provides overall protection by reducing oral bacteria and inflammation.Red Thyme - an essential oil that has powerful antiseptic properties.Echinacea - a powerful antimicrobial herb that helps stimulate the healing process.Gotu Kola - an herb that has been used for centuries to aid in wound healing.

Refreshing Oral Rinse With Essential Oils for Healthier Teeth and Gums. Stimulating Fluoride-Free Toothpaste for Healthier Teeth and Gums Naturally Revitalizing Essential Oil Concentrate for Dilution with an Oral Irrigator Soothing Gum Care Gel for Inflamed Gums, Oral Sores, and Irritation Exhilarating Breath Freshening Spray for Natural, Long-Lasting Protection Reduces Harmful Bacteria, Inflammation and Bleeding ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Eliminates Bad Breath ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Relieves Mouth Sores ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Relieves Dry Mouth ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Variants Aloe Vera, Xylitol Aloe Vera, Xylitol Size 18 oz. 4 oz. 4 oz. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars truly natural ingredients and alcohol free
reviews.reviewText: No alcohol; no tooth staining; no bad chemicals which kill good mouth bacteria; no lip swelling or burning sensation; use alcohol mouth washes to soak your feet if you have foot fungus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's all in the taste
reviews.reviewText: Loved this product. Really gives a clean minty taste. My dental exam went well . Don't know if this was reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No plaque buildup
reviews.reviewText: I have plaque buildup on my teeth from eating too much protein, even with brushing extra, but when I use this rinse I don't see the buildup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My Dentist recommended this product, to help me with my dental routine. Im pleased with the all natural ingredients, unlike other brands...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While this product is expensive, it definitely does the work. It says it’s going to do my dentist recommended this for me and my gums has drastically improved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mouthwash but pricey
reviews.reviewText: My gums and mouth feels great after using this mouthwash. However, these are pricey. I can't see myself buying these on the regular. If you have mouth/gums problems, try these for a month or two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best mouthwash I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: For the last 10 years, I've had growing issues with gum recession due to stress, depression. My home care was never the issue, so it got very stressful and terrifying - felt like I was doing everything I should, but the gums still got lower and thinner. Not cool - nobody wants their teeth to fall out! So I went on my journey to lower my stress and take care of my health. I started using this tonic after learning about it from a natural dentist. Well...it is the best mouthwash I've EVER used. I love this brand. I've also used their irrigant, which is nice. I know the product IS pricey, BUT, you pay for quality. It uses all natural ingredients (no chemical colorants to make it oh so blue) and it tastes amazing! You know you're actually giving your mouth a deep clean with safe ingredients. Also, you don't need to use a lot because it's potent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Healthful mouthwash withOUT fluoride or alcohol!
reviews.reviewText: i originally received a bottle of this product from my long time dentist...and since his retirement i've been happy to find it on amazon...the vendors are dependable and provide the product quickly....best possible wash for mouth and gums! thanks
